contest-event.event-date:
July 10, 1897 D Forfar Contest
Forfar Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
forfar-contest
None
Station Park, Forfar, Angus, Scotland, UK Source: The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Monday, July 12, 1897; pg. 5; Issue 13740.
Best Solo Cornet: R. Campbell, Arbroath Best Solo Euphonium: J. Esplin, Arbroath Best Solo Horn: F. Martin, Arbroath Best Bass Trombone: John Adam, Brechin
This was the first in a series of four 1897 contests for the championship of the newly-formed Forfarshire Amateur Brass Band Association. Brechin City were the overall champions.
March 8, 2012, 3:12 p.m. March 8, 2012, 4:30 p.m.
1 Arbroath Instrumental Friend Farrand Great Britain
2 Brechin City Richard Marsden Tam O'Shanter [Round]
3 Forfar Instrumental John Lamb Tam O'Shanter [Round]
4 St. Margaret's Old (Dundee) James Robinson Great Britain
